Description: This template creates a Service Account for a MongoDB Atlas project. Project Service Accounts provide programmatic access to project-level resources with specific roles.

ProjectId.Description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

Name.Description: Human-readable name for the Service Account.

Description.Description: Human readable description for the Service Account.

Roles.Description: List of project-level roles for the Service Account (comma-separated). Example: GROUP_OWNER,GROUP_READ_ONLY,GROUP_DATA_ACCESS_READ_WRITE

SecretExpiresAfterHours.Description: Expiration time of the new Service Account secret in hours. The minimum and maximum allowed expiration times are subject to change and are controlled by the organization's settings.

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

ClientId.Description: The Client ID of the Service Account

CreatedAt.Description: Date and time that the Service Account was created on
